markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, when what exists, because of grasping what and insisting on what, does the view arise: ‘A Realized One exists after death’?” …

SN.24.16. Nahotitathāgatosutta (“A Realized One Doesn’t Exist”)
